document.full_text: the death toll from the may 22 joplin, missouri tornado rose to 138 thursday, after hospitals confirmed four additional deaths from injuries, state officials said.
document.title: death toll from joplin tornado rises to 138: officials
lines_and_colors: the death toll from the may 22 joplin, missouri tornado rose to 138 thursday, after hospitals confirmed four additional deaths from injuries, state officials said.
